Founder Departure: If a Founder ceases to be employed by or provide services to 
the Company for any reason (a ‚ÄúSeparation Event‚Äù), any shares that have not vested 
as of the date of the Separation Event shall be forfeited and returned to the

(RM and PS shall hereinafter be collectively referred to  as the ‚Äú Founders ‚Äù and 
individually as a ‚Äú Founder ‚Äù)

Major Decisions: The following decisions shall require the unanimous written 
consent of both Founders: (i) sale or merger of the Company; (ii) raising external 
funding; (iii) taking on debt above ‚Çπ 10,00,000; (iv) issuing new shares or creating an 
employee stock option pool; (v) changing the core business of the Company

any and all intellectual property (including ideas, inventions, copyrights, and designs) 
created by them in relation to the business of the Company, whether created prior to 
or during their engagement with the Company

final.summary:
FOUNDER'S  AGREEMENT ‚Äì Simplified Summary

1. Parties involved:
o ConnectSphere  AI Pvt. Ltd.
o C. The Founders are entering into this Agreemen t to set forth their mutual 
understanding and agreement regarding their respective rights, responsibilities, and 
obligations in relation to the Company
o ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES  
The Founders agree to devot e their full professional time and best efforts to the 
business of the Company
o EQUITY OWNERSHIP  
The initial authorized share capital of the Company
2. Purpose: Rahul Mehra, 10,00,000, company, AGREEMENT, Clause 1, inc.
3. During discussions, both parties may exchange confidential information (business plans, finances, customer lists, technical data, trade secrets, know-how, designs, source codes, marketing strategies, etc.).
4. Obligations of the Receiving Party:
o Keep the information in strict confidence and protect it like its own confidential data.
o Not share it with any third party without the written consent of the Disclosing Party.
o Use it only for the Purpose and nothing else.
o Share it only with employees, directors, advisors, or consultants who need to know, provided they also follow confidentiality obligations.
5. Rahul Mehra, 10,00,000, company, AGREEMENT, Clause 1, inc.
6. residing at 5/B, Hindu Colony, Agreement, Ms.

ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES  
The Founders agree to devot e their full professional time and best efforts to the 
business of the Company

Vesting Period: The shares shall vest over a period of four (4) years from the date 
of this Agreement (the ‚ÄúVesting Period‚Äù)

EQUITY OWNERSHIP  
The initial authorized share capital of the Company is ‚Çπ1,00,000 divided into 10,000 
equity shares o f ‚Çπ10 each

CONFIDENTIALITY  
The Founders agree to maintain the confidentiality of all proprietary information of 
the Company and of each oth er, both during and after their association with the 
Company

Day -to-day Operations: Day -to-day business decisions shall be made by the 
Found ers in accordance with their roles defined in Clause 1

FOUNDER'S  AGREEMENT  
This Founder's Agreement (the ‚Äú Agreement ‚Äù) is made and entered into on this 22nd 
day of August, 2025

The Founders are entering into this Agreemen t to set forth their mutual 
understanding and agreement regarding their respective rights, responsibilities, and 
obligations in relation to the Company

The Founders have jointly conceptualized and intend to operate the business of 
developing and marketing an AI -powered networking platform

The Founders have incorporated a private limit ed company under the name 
‚ÄúConnectSphere  AI Pvt

Priya Sharma (PS): Chief Executive Officer (CEO), responsible for overall 
business strategy, fundraising, marketing, and operations

Rahul Mehra (RM): Chief Technology Officer (CTO), responsible for product 
development, technology strategy, and managing the engineering team

Founder Departure: If a Founder ceases to be employed by or provide services to 
the Company for any reason (a ‚ÄúSeparation Event‚Äù), any shares that have not vested 
as of the date of the Separation Event shall be forfeited and returned to the 
Company for cancellation

(RM and PS shall hereinafter be collectively referred to  as the ‚Äú Founders ‚Äù and 
individually as a ‚Äú Founder ‚Äù)

Major Decisions: The following decisions shall require the unanimous written 
consent of both Founders: (i) sale or merger of the Company; (ii) raising external 
funding; (iii) taking on debt above ‚Çπ 10,00,000; (iv) issuing new shares or creating an 
employee stock option pool; (v) changing the core business of the Company

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY ASSIGNMENT  
Each Founder hereby assigns to the Company all their rights, title, and interest in 
any and all intellectual property (including ideas, inventions, copyrights, and designs) 
created by them in relation to the business of the Company, whether created prior to 
or during their engagement with the Company
